snippet: With Congress set to debate the issue next year, George W. Bush asked policy makers to keep in mind the many contributions immigrants make to the economy when mulling changes to the law.
abstract: Former Pres George W Bush calls on Republican policy makers in Washington to soften their tone on immigration, and to recognize the economic importance of an open immigration policy; Pres Obama has signaled that he wants to begin a debate on immigration in early 2013.
lead_paragraph: With Congress set to debate the issue next year, George W. Bush asked policy makers to keep in mind the many contributions immigrants make to the economy when mulling changes to the law.

headline.seo: Praising Immigrants, Bush Leads Conservative Appeal for G.O.P. to Soften Tone
